dialogues.text: Oscar looks from closed store to closed store, the group following closely behind him. He spots Sammy, Middle East Early 50's, closing the metal gates on his store. Oscar trots up ahead of the group to Sammy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Say bruh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're all closed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know man, but a couple young ladies with me really got to use the bathroom man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Don't worry about it. Don't worry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck, I can't move! Caruso stands up, pushing off Oscar's head with his hands Ingram flips him over off of Carlos' legs and onto his stomach. Oscar squirms again, while Caruso grabs his hand trying to put it behind his back. Caruso puts his knee ba down on Oscar, driving down hard, at the base of his head pressing Oscar's face against the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck. I can't get his hands! Back up. Caruso lifts up off of Oscar. Ingram stands up a bit, kee one knee in Oscar's back, reaches on the right side of hi belt and pulls a black gun from the holster. He stands up, aims it at Oscar's back. BLAM!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Oscar's body jerks against the pavement. He lets out a sickening, hollow sound. Dead silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophina whips her head around towards the platform.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Katie and Joe's jaw's drop at the sound of the shooting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Pete, and Steph, who have been on this train the w time. Pete recording with his video camera, with shock on face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cato is frozen by shock. Caruso takes a step back, and lo at Ingram with confusion. Oscar takes a struggled breath in, coughs up some blood. stiffly turns his body around to Ingram.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ..you shot me... you shot me. i got a daughter...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brandon, Carlos, Tim stare at Oscar is disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They shot Osc! They fuckin shot Osc bruh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cato looses it, he pushes past the police officers in fro of him. He throws his cellphone at Ingram, just missing h face. It hits the wall, and explodes into pieces. the Cop rush Cato, taking him to the ground. Oscar's friends go berserk they start screaming. Brandon tries to stand up, still handcuffed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OSC! OSC! GET UP MY NIGGA!!! (to Ingram)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YOU SHOT MY HOMIE!!! HE WASN'T DOING NOTHING!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Three Cops rush over and take Brandon to the ground. Othe Cops descend on the other boys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call the ambulance!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHEN YOU SHUT THE FUCK UP, WE WILL!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ingram flips Oscar back over and handcuffs him, and start search him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck you handcuffing him for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Cops take all of the boys towards the escalators. But none of them go without a struggle. It takes four Cops to control Brandon. Caruso runs over to Tenisha who looks on from the Operato car with panic in her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take off! (beat) Go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Passengers are shouting and going crazy, still filmin The doors suddenly close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Hey open the fucking doors! Somebody help him!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Zafiratos holds his daughter while looking out the windows as if he'd just seen a ghost. Cale still blends i the crowd. The doors close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Passengers are even crazier on this car. Hanging out the doors in the front of the crowd are Katie and Joe. Katie continues to record with her iPhone- her face red with ra

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The car doors start to close, but Katie sticks her hand o them causing them to open back up. She continues filming. Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tenisha looks down at the control board, while Caruso lea in her car window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go! Fucking pull off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't somebody's blocking the doors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caruso turns and looks down the platform. He sees Katie hanging out of the first car and sprints over to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Clear the door!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO! YOU GUYS JUST SHOT HIM!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLEAR THE FUCKING DOOR!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caruso pushes Katie's hand back and the doors shut. The t pulls off. Caruso grabs his walkie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into walkie) Yeah there's been a shooting. Here at the Fruitvale station--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ingram finishes searching Oscar only finds a wallet. He's sweating bullets. Caruso runs over to Ingram.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ingram can't answer. Caruso snatches Oscar's wallet out o his hands and waves him away. He and bends down and un-cu Oscar. He rolls him over and we see Oscar's eyes are star to grow distant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering to Oscar) Come'on breathe, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caruso bends down to look at Oscar.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: We see Oscar's phone is on the ground ringing. The screen reads, "Sophina Calling". Green (7/5/2012)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophina now frantic, stands with her cellphone to her ear Kris and Vanessa talk to three POLICE OFFICERS who are guarding the entrance like club bouncers. Sophina hangs up the phone, then quickly dials another number.

dialogues.speaker: INT. WANDA'S BEDROOM- NIGHT
dialogues.text: Only moonlight fills the room. A cellphone RINGS. Wanda w up, checks it, answers the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophina?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The police got Oscar and them and we heard something I don't know if it was a beanbag or a taser or what.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophina, baby calm down. I can't hear you. Is Oscar there with you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Naw, he upstairs, with the Police and I can't see them. We downstairs-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We in Oakland, at Fruitvale BART.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did Oscar get arrested?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, I think so.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wanda closes her eyes for a beat, this hurts. She gets ou bed and starts putting on her clothes.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: A SIREN is now super close. Sophina turns to see four PARAMEDICS rush through the emergency entrance turnstile rolling a large gurney with medical equipment on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into phone) Imma call you back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophina hangs up the phone and runs towards the paramedic

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They ignore her, and quickly get into the elevator with t gear, the doors close behind them. Sophina hears COMMOTIO coming from the escalators. She looks over and sees Brand kicking and struggling, as the Cops bring him down. Cato, Tim, Jason, and Carlos follow, all surrounded by Cops. Vanessa and Kris run over to them as the bring them out towards the parking lot, where several Police Cars are parked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophina sprints over to the cars. Cato and Brandon are go so crazy that they don't even notice her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Sophina) Get back!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophina get's Jason's attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where Osc at? What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THEY FUCKING SHOT HIM PHINA!!! THEY SHOT OSC IN HIS BACK FOR NO REASON!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHAT? IS HE OKAY? WHERE IS HE?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Cops stuff Jason into the back of their car before he answer. They stuff Tim into the same car. It takes four Cops to get Brandon. Another group of Cops having the same problem with Cato.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oscar still lies on the ground, Caruso lies over him, hol his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering) Come on man keep your eyes open. Breathe, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elevator doors open, and the Paramedics rush towards Oscar. Caruso stands up, starts talking to PARAMEDIC 1, h him Oscar's ID. The others immediately begin tending to Oscar. They check vitals, and pull out a pair of large scissors and quickly off his shirt. They flip him over, revealing a large entr wound on his left shoulder blade. It bleeds profusely. Paramedic 1 walks over to Oscar and kneels down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oscar? Oscar can you hear me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oscar tries to nod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophina is in tears, arguing with the Cops guarding the platform.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please let me through, that's my boyfriend up there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her cellphone rings. She looks down at it and grows more frantic. She answers it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophina baby, what's going on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (through the phone) The cops won't let me through, and, and Jason said that Osc...                                OH MY GOD! OH GOD! IS THAT OSC! NO, NO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Horror flashes over Wanda's face.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUOUS
dialogues.text: Sophina is hysterical, we finally see what she sees-

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The paramedics rushing Oscar, dressed only in his red box out of the elevator on a gurney, his mouth connected to a hand pumped oxygen mask. They quickly wheel him out towards the ambulance, which i parked next to the Police cars. Sophina runs after them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's my fucking baby daddy right there! Is he dead? Did they fucking kill him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PARAMEDIC 1 turns to Sophina as they load Oscar in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's been shot, he's still alive but we gotta get him to Highland.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He quickly boards the ambulance, they shut the door in Sophina's face. Sophina breaks down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (out of phone speaker) Sophina, Sophina!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They shot him. They shot Oscar! They say he alive, but he's bleeding and his eyes was closed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wanda screams. She prays to herself and regains control a bit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are they taking him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (through phone) They takin him to Highland, you gotta come and get us, our car in Hayward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm on my way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wanda hangs up the phone, and rushes out of the bedroom. Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophina hangs up the phone and watches as the Ambulance speeds off down Fruitvale Blvd. Cato, still in the back of the police car, is kicking the window with both feet. Brandon continues to scream from h car. The police cars pull off.

dialogues.speaker: MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: The doors burst open, and the Paramedics wheel Oscar into ER Trauma room.

dialogues.speaker: INT. TRAUMA ROOM- MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: We are close on Oscar as he lies on his back, unconscious breathing tubes are attached to his mouth. His chest rise and down slowly, struggled. SURGEONS, and PARAMEDICS move around Oscar. The LEAD SURGEON, a tall, slim Black man in his 50's, poi to an object that lies just under Oscar's right clavicle, just under his skin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's here, its right beneath the skin.

dialogues.speaker: OSCAR'S CLAVICLE
dialogues.text: The surgeon takes a scalpel and cuts into Oscar's skin, j above the protruding mass. Blood runs out, he presses dow and pops out the bullet, that looks like a large metal mushroom. The surgeon examines it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus. It's like it hit something solid. Bone wouldn't do this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He places the bullet into an empty beaker atop a cart. He turns back to Oscar and begins to stitch up the incision. Lead Surgeon looks at xrays of Oscar's chest on a light board. Paramedic 2 stands over his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was lying face down on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Resident Surgeon points to a large dark cloud on the xr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right here, right lung looks to be what's causing the pulse problem.

dialogues.speaker: OSCAR'S CHEST
dialogues.text: The Surgeon sticks a tube into the right side of Oscar's chest, and blood flows out of the tube uncontrollably. Spilling onto the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit, Shit, we gotta get him upstairs!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The medical staff sees this, and kicks their movements in high gear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oscar lies on the operating table, sedated. The Surgeons medical speak. They move with astounding quickness and precision. Lead Surgeon takes a large scalpel, and makes inch incision under Oscar's right nipple. Blood rushes out, it's worse than they thought. It begins hit the floor. A RESIDENT SURGEON reacts to this, and qui grabs a large emesis basin. He puts it underneath the wou catching the blood. Another Surgeon places a spreader int the wound, and opens it up. The Lead surgeon looks inside of the incision. He lets hi head down in frustration at what he sees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His lung's gone. We gotta prep for removal.

dialogues.speaker: INT. ICU NURSE'S STATION- NIGHT
dialogues.text: A NURSE stands behind a reception desk.. Wanda, Sophina, Vanessa, and Kris storm into the room. Wanda goes up to t RECEPTIONIST, a black woman in her 20's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My son is Oscar Julius Grant III. He's been shot, and they told me to come here-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Nurse sits at the computer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: G-R-A-N-T?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wanda nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's still in the operating room. Go to the ICU waiting room and                          someone will be out soon to let you know everything that's going on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wanda nods and walks over towards the chairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (under her breath) Lord please let him be okay. Please watch over him with your healing hands Lord. Keep him Safe Lord. Keep him safe so that I can hold him once again.

dialogues.speaker: INT. OPERATING ROOM- MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: The operation is fully underway. A surgeon removes Oscar' lung from the incision. We see a NURSE change out a bag of Donor Blood on one of many IV systems Oscar is hooked up to. She tosses into a where it lands atop five other empty bags.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

dialogues.speaker: INT. ICU WAITING ROOM- MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: Wanda sits in the waiting room next to Sophina. The Boys storm into the room along with JACK BRYSON SR. a Hispanic looking man in his 40's. Kris greets the boys, a they head over to Wanda. He stands close to his sons Jack and Tim. The Nurse walks from behind the back room with the Lead Surgeon, who now wears fresh scrubs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wanda?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wanda nods, and stands up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oscar was shot, okay? We've stabilized him, but he's in critical condition. The bullet caused massive internal bleeding and we had to remove the right lung.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His lung? How is he... How is he going to be able to breathe?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, his breathing isn't our concern. It's the bleeding. We're working very hard to get his blood to clot. But right now, his body isn't taking the transfusions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But he's going to make it right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hard to say, but we're gonna do everything we can okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, okay. Please do whatever you can, okay? My son is a good boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please do what you can. Please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He nods and pats Wanda on the shoulder for a beat, then t and heads back into the ICU. Wanda walks back over to the group. She gives them the news from the doctor.

dialogues.speaker: INT. ICU RECOVERY ROOM- MORNING- FEW HOURS LATER
dialogues.text: Several Nurses Operate around Oscar who still lies unconscious his breathing sounding more struggled than ev Suddenly blood begins to run from his right nostril, then right eyelid, and his left nostril after that. His EKG machine begins to BEEP loudly. The Nurses go into panic mode.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Early morning daylight streams into the waiting area. Whe Wanda, Sophina, Chantay, Ceephus, Daryl, and Oscar's frie hold hands. Wanda, leads them in prayer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --and we ask that you may put your healing hands around your child, we ask that you may operate through these doctors, and breathe strength into their hands as they work on him. Heal him lord so that we may one day see his smile again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lines of blood trickle from Oscar's eyes, nose, and mouth The Lead is now in the room and has taken over commands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loosing a pulse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oscar's body begins to violently shake. A young male RESIDENT DOCTOR, grabs the paddles, the Lead Surgeon touches Oscar's chest, we see under his skin is filled with fluid. He taps the Resident Doctor on the shoulder and shakes his head. He looks up at the clock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Calling it. Time of Death 9:01 am.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls off his mask, frustrated, and walks out. Oscar's convulsions stop. A morbid, continuous beep echoes from t EKG.

dialogues.speaker: INT. ICU WAITING ROOM- DAY- MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: The Lead Surgeon walks out, and Wanda is still in the cir praying. The Nurse goes over to her, pulls her aside. Wanda approaches the Lead Surgeon with a hopeful look in eyes. She reads his eyes for a beat. The Lead Surgeon looks at her for a beat. And shakes his head. Wanda puts her face in her hands, her legs wobble. Sophina who was watching and listening closely sees this. breaks down, buries her face in Oscar's hoodie. Daryl and Ceephus run over to Wanda, just as he arrives, legs buckle a bit, he catches her. Oscar's friends begin to break down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I see him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Lead Surgeon nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But its a homicide, so they can't let you in the room with him, ok?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wanda nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How many of you will be coming                         down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wanda are you sure?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wanda nods. Nurse looks at the Surgeon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can take her down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He heads towards the exit doors with Wanda.

dialogues.speaker: INT. MORGUE HALLWAY- DAY- MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: The Nurse   walks Wanda through a long corridor.

dialogues.speaker: INT. MORGUE- DAY- MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: Wanda steps up to the glass and looks into it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MORTICIAN pulls back a white sheet, and we see Oscar' mangled Body lying on the slab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told him to catch the train. I told him to catch BART! I didn't know they were gonna hurt him. I didn't know. I should have just let him drive. I should have let him drive. I wanted him to be safe. Please please let me hug him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please let me go hug him. He didn't like to be alone!! I let my baby                       die alone!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

dialogues.speaker: INT. ICU WAITING ROOM- DAY
dialogues.text: Sophina sits in a chair still smelling Oscar's hoodie, he head spinning. REPORTERS are starting to show up at the hospital. We see Katie there, still wearing the same clot talking to Brandon's father, pointing at her cellphone. Sophina looks up at a flat screen television in the hospi sees a report that showing Oscar's picture. She takes out her cellphone. Dials a number, puts it to h ear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into phone) Rose, don't turn on the TV okay? I'm coming to get T right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophina hangs up the phone and runs over to Brandon's fat

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you to take me to my car?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He nods.

dialogues.speaker: INT. ROSE'S HOUSE- LIVING ROOM- DEN- MORNING
dialogues.text: Sophina lets herself into the house. We see Rose in the bathroom sitting on the stool, grief-stricken. Sophina tu into the den, where Tatiana and her cousins are still asl She steps over them to get to Tatiana.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T, come on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tatiana groggily wakes up. Sophina picks her up.

dialogues.speaker: INT. OSCAR'S HOUSE- DAY
dialogues.text: Sophina walks in and looks around the house. Tatiana walk inside. And goes straight for Oscar and Sophina's bedroom

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daddy? Daddy? Time to go to "Chuck E Cheese"!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tatiana comes out of the bedroom looking confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Daddy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on T, we gotta take a shower.

dialogues.speaker: INT. OSCAR'S BATHROOM- DAY
dialogues.text: The same shower from earlier. Sophina turns the water on, helps Tatiana with her clothes, and puts her in. She take off her own clothes and steps in as well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is the water okay T?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Where's daddy? Is he on vacation again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophina tries to find her words. Lets the water run on he face for a bit, then rubs down the friz in Tatiana's hair

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember when I told you about God... and the angels?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And about how when we die we go to heaven?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, God needed another angel, so he took Daddy to come and live in heaven with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tatiana looks at Sophina for a long beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I don't want Daddy to live in heaven. I want him to be with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He can't. Once you go to heaven, you can't come back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tatiana thinks about this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well does he have his cellphone? Maybe if I call him and talk to him, he will come back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Daddy doesn't have his cellphone baby. You can't call him where he is.
